headline: Mira Murati’s Thinking Machines Lab is worth $12B in seed round
summary: The deal marks one of the largest seed rounds — or first funding rounds — in Silicon Valley history, representing the massive investor appetite to back promising new AI labs. Thinking Machines Lab is less than a year old and has yet to reveal what it's working on.

raw.headline: Mira Murati’s Thinking Machines Lab is worth $12B in seed round
raw.summary: The deal marks one of the largest seed rounds — or first funding rounds — in Silicon Valley history, representing the massive investor appetite to back promising new AI labs. Thinking Machines Lab is less than a year old and has yet to reveal what it's working on.

headline: Mira Murati's AI startup Thinking Machines valued at $12 billion in early-stage funding
summary: The massive funding round for a company launched only in February, with no revenue or products yet, underscores Murati's ability to attract investors in a sector where top executives have become coveted targets in an escalating talent war.  "We're excited that in the next couple months we will be able to share our first product, which will include a significant open source component and be useful for researchers and startups developing custom model," CEO Murati said in a post on the X social media platform.

headline: Nortal Acquires Nearsure to Expand AI Enterprise Solutions Across the Americas
summary: Nearsure’s Tech Talent Combines with Nortal’s U.S. Scale and Global Reach, Powered by a Shared Customer-first VisionKIRKLAND, Wash., July 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Nortal, a multinational digital transformation company, today announced its acquisition of Nearsure, a U.S.-based technology solutions provider with talent across 18 Latin American countries. The merger accelerates Nortal’s expansion across the Americas by tapping into Latin America’s world-class tech talent and increasing capacity

headline: inMorphis Appoints Sunne K Kumaar as Chief Revenue Officer to Accelerate Global Growth
summary: inMorphis, a ServiceNow-invested company and fast-growing digital transformation firm, is delighted to announce the appointment of Sunne K Kumaar as their new Chief Revenue Officer (CRO).
